description: This recipe makes a pint of mayo. If you’re not likely to use that much within two or three weeks, consider making a half batch or freezing what you can’t use right away.
name: Tofu-Cashew Mayonnaise
recipeIngredient: 1 12.3 ounce package lite firm or extra-firm silken tofu (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Drain water from tofu and place it and all other ingredients except salt in a high-speed blender. Blend at highest speed until light and creamy. Add salt to taste and blend again. Seal tightly and keep refrigerated. Stir before each use.
